text: Henry Edward Goldberg (July 4, 1940 â€“ July 4, 2022) was an American sports radio and television personality. He was the radio color commentator for the Miami Dolphins from 1978 to 1992. He also worked at WIOD, WTVJ and ESPN in 1993. Goldberg died at his home in Las Vegas, Nevada on July 4, 2022 from kidney failure and diabetes on his 82nd birthday. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:American sports commentators Category:People from Newark, New Jersey Category:Journalists from New Jersey Category:Television personalities from New Jersey
title: Hank Goldberg
